name: MSR Revo Trail Backcountry and Trekking Snowshoes
short_description: Strong injection-molded ExoTract deck with steel crampon and perimeter teeth provides torsional flex and excellent grip for deep purchase in a variety of snow conditions
Paraglide binding stretch mesh hugs feet securely and is compatible with nearly any footwear, from light hikers to snowboard boots
Glove-friendly binding straps and buckle tabs are easy to use and make getting in and out quick and simple
Attachment points for 5-inch modular flotation tails (sold separately) which provide on-demand flotation for deep powder or when carrying heavier loads
Size: 22 x 8 in (56 x 20 cm). Weight: 3 lbs 10 oz (1.65 kg). Compatible with shoe sizes 3M-13M/5W-15W (EU 36-47)
product_description: Made to handle a variety of conditions, the Revo Trail snowshoes provide excellent grip, flex and durability thanks to the lightweight injection-molded plastic ExoTract deck and steel traction frames. Paraglide bindings are easy to use and incredibly comfortable, with pressure point-free stretch mesh that securely hugs your feet. MSR snowshoes are designed, engineered and made to exacting standards in the USA with the highest quality U.S. and imported materials to perform reliably in winter conditions.

name: Frelaxy Leg Gaiters Ultra HIGH-Performance Hunting Gaiters, 100% Waterproof Hiking Gaiters with Upgraded Rubber Foot Strap, Adjustable Snow Boot Gaiters
short_description: ✔ULTRA HIGH-PERFORMANCE LEG Gaiters - Frelaxy ALL- PURPOSE Gaiters design to keep your leg safe, dry, and warm in extreme conditions, Effectively prevent Snow, water, dirt, and pebbles from entering into your shoes or pants, perfect for Hiking, Hunting, Snowshoeing, also a good addition to home gardening.

✔EXCEPTIONAL LONGEVITY. EXCLUSIVE VALUE. The gaiter is constructed of 900D Anti-Tear Waterproof coated Oxford Fabric. Designed to maximize waterproof efficiency (Tested 100% waterproof), durability (50% more than most other brands), and wear comfortability, all while keeping weight at a minimum.
✔UPGRADED RUBBER INSTEP STRAPS: Goodbye, Loosen Straps! 3 Layer high-abrasion Rubber Instep Strap with Durable Metal Buckle, Stay grip to your boots, won't add any hassle for your walking.

✔PERFECT FIT FOR MAXIMUM PERFORMANCE: Adjustable Top Drawstring & Elastic Band in the middle and down area & A 2"-wide Velcro opening runs the full length of the gaiter provides excellent fit adjustability.

✔TOUGH LIFETIME WARRANTY: We are so confident in our tough leg gaiters, so we put a no-questions-asked TOUGH LIFETIME WARRANTY on our leg gaiters. We even offer a FREE Exchange size if not match WITHOUT RETURNING, totally RISK-FREE SHOPPING!

name: Trail Gaiters Low Shoes Gators for Hiking Boots Breathable Boots Gators for Running
short_description: 4 POINTS FIXED SYSTEM: The bottom band is fixed at the bottom, eliminating the need to stop multiple times to readjust the bottom strap. The hook is located in the front, there is an anti-slip belt at the back, and the top around the ankle is adjustable, ensuring that the trail gaiters stay in place securely.

ALL-COVER PROTECTION: This running gaiters are awesome and cover all of the shoelace area. Worked excellent for keeping pebbles, mud, dirt, sand, water and snow out of trail sneakers and boots. Don't have to take your boots or shoes off to clear out gravel and stuff.

APPLICABLE SCENE These sneaker gaiters are perfect for outdoor adventures. Enjoy the comfort of these low shoe gaiters during activities such as hiking, trail running, climbing, skiing, and jungle work. They are designed to enhance your travel experience in the wild.

STAND WEAR AND TEAR- Our low trail gaiters have a bottom band made of HYPALON rubber, known for its exceptional durability and resistance to wear. The top material is crafted from highly elastic LYCRA fabric, ensuring a soft, comfortable, breathable, lightweight, and long-lasting design.
RELIABLE AFTER-SELL SERVICE: If you have any questions about the product, please feel free to contact us anytime. We will reply to you ASAP : )

name: MSR Evo Trail Snowshoes, 22 Inch Pair, Midnight
short_description: Steel crampons and traction rails provide a reliable traction and lasting grip
Injection-molded UniBody deck gives just the right amount of flex and is incredibly durable
Paraglide binding stretch mesh hugs feet securely and is compatible with nearly any footwear, from light hikers to snowboard boots
Glove-friendly binding straps and buckle tabs are easy to use and make getting in and out quick and simple
Attachment points for 6-inch modular flotation tails (sold separately) which provide on-demand flotation for deep powder or when carrying heavier loads
Size: 22 x 8 in (56 x 20 cm). Weight: 3 lbs 10 oz (1.64 kg). Compatible with shoe sizes 3M-13M/5W-15W (EU 36-47)
Made in the USA
product_description: Durable and easy to use, the Evo Trail snowshoes are ready for years of adventures. The UniBody frames and steel traction rails offer the essential grip needed for even modest slopes in less than ideal conditions, while Paraglide bindings are easy to use and incredibly comfortable. The pressure point-free stretch mesh securely hugs your feet and is compatible with nearly any footwear. MSR snowshoes are designed, engineered and made to exacting standards in the USA with the highest quality U.S. and imported materials to perform reliably in winter conditions.

name: G2 23/25/30 Inch Mountain Terrain Snowshoes with Trekking Poles Set, Special Steel Traction Rails, EVA Foam Padded, Flexible Pivot Bar, Tote Bag, Grey/Blue/Red Available
short_description: ❄【STRONG MATERIAL】- G2 snowshoes used high quality & lightweight HDPE as its deck to provide a nice floatage in snowfield so that users can save their energy and go further.

❄【PROFESSIONALLY DESIGNED】-Fast ratchet binding is designed for low-temperature environment. It can be fastened easily by lift the one-pull buckle with just one-finger even when your hands are frozen.
❄【IMPROVED CRAMPONS】- This sharp crampons is made of high quality steel, which gives an excellent grip in snowfield or ice, keep you from dangerous.
❄【MORE COMFORTABLE】- We padded soft EVA foam inside of snowshoes to provide a warm and comfortable feeling, protect your feet during cold winter.
❄【SPECIAL CONSTRUCTION】- The G2 pivot bar is more flexible than traditional snowshoes, allowing users to feel more natural whether on the flats or uphill, allowing you to enjoy winter hiking more.

name: COZIA Merino Wool Socks for Men and Women Warm thermal Boot Hiking Socks 3 Pairs
short_description: SOFT, SMOOTH AND WARM Fashioned out of premium quality merino wool, these wool socks for men and women promise coziness and warmth without you feeling overheated thanks to their natural temperature control ability.

COZY YET BREATHABLE Perfect as winter socks for men and women who want to stay warm without their feet feeling sweaty, these wool socks feature ventilation channels and moisture control fibers that wick away sweat while fighting unpleasant foot odors.
REINFORCED HEEL AND TOE Reinforced yarn in the heel and toe increase the durability of the wool socks mens footwear, allowing you to wear them for many seasons to come without them fraying.
FULL CUSHION FOOTBED Along the footbed of these women and mens merino wool socks is specialized cushioning that provides additional comfort and support with each step.
ITCH-FREE WOOL SOCKS ENSURE YOUR COMFORT Unlike other types of wool, these wool socks are itch-free for your comfort.
product_description: When it comes to wintertime, having proper protection for your feet to keep them warm and safe from the bite of winter is crucial. Relying on the standard styles of socks that get you through the rest of the warmer months of the year won't cut it during the wintertime; you need to change out standard cotton socks for warm merino wool socks. With these COZIA 80% Merino Wool Socks, you can get the best winter socks, whether you want to relax at home in your cozy socks or go hiking and keep your feet safe. The COZIA 80% Merino Wool Socks are made from 80% merino wool, a type of wool that provides you with remarkable warmth without having to worry about the itchiness that wool socks often bring. These warm socks for women and men are not only itch-free, but they are made to be as breathable as possible thanks to the moisture wicking fabric that keeps away sweat, as well as the ventilated channels that promote breathability. These channels are also found along the ankles, helping to reduce the bulk there. The wool blend used in the COZIA 80% Merino Wool Socks naturally regulates the temperature of your feet, keeping you warm even during the coldest winter days. These men's and women's socks also feature natural arch compression to offer greater support and stability. These women's socks also feature a fully padded footbed to make every step you take more comfortable while ankle vents help reduce bulk. Take care of your feet this winter with the COZIA 80% Merino Wool Socks. Click add to cart now.

name: Crescent Moon EVA Unisex Ultralight EVA Foam Snowshoes for Men & Women Adults, for Hiking and Running, with Dual Density Rocker Cloud Deck and Ice Spikes
short_description: Ultralight EVA Foam Construction: These unisex snowshoes feature a lightweight EVA foam build, making them ideal running and hiking snowshoes for women and men. Each pair only weighs 3lbs. 8 oz!
Unique Design: Rocker platform bends and rolls with your foot like your favorite pair of athletic shoes; Teardrop shape preserves your natural stride and makes walking in snow effortless.
Perfect Fit for All Adults: Versatile and adjustable, these snow shoes for women and men are engineered to provide a snug fit, ensuring an optimal experience for every adventure-seeking adult.
Easy To Use: These are by far the easiest and most intuitive snowshoes to use. The Secure hook and loop bindings are incredibly intuitive, simple, and stay tight across rolling terrain; 24 x 8 inches
Strong Traction: Durable rubber lugs provide serious traction and ice cleats (included) give stability on hardpack and icy conditions. Each Eva comes with 6 ice spikes installed on the bottom.

name: Retrospec Drifter Snowshoe for Men & Women - Aluminum Frames & a Double-Rachet Binding System - Lightweight All Terrain Snow Shoes
short_description: ENGINEERED FOR PRIME WINTERTIME PERFORMANCE﻿: The Drifter Snowshoe has a tough polyethylene (HDPE) decks for maximum support on the snow so you can feel confident on all your snowshoeing adventures.
DOUBLE-RATCHET BINDING: Fast, secure double-ratchet binding system allows you to easily strap in and out while on the trail.
LIGHTWEIGHT DURABILITY: Lightweight 6061-T6 alloy frames with tough polyethylene decks provide superior support on the snow and keep your steps light and controlled.
TRACTION & STABILITY: The heel lifters and full-floating pivot system increases traction and reduces fatigue while exploring steep terrain.
I﻿NCLUDED: Drifter snowshoes and mesh vented carrying bag. Great for storing your snowshoes in the summer months. Available in 21"/80-120lbs, 25"/110-160lbs, & 30"/160-210lbs.
product_description: The Retrospec Drifter Snowshoe is engineered for prime wintertime performance﻿ with heel lifters and a full-floating pivot system for increased traction and stability. The snowshoes are constructed with 6061-T6 aluminum alloy frames and polyethylene (HDPE) decks for maximum support and durability on the snow. Effortlessly glide through the snow with less strain and more control with the Retrospec Drifter Snowshoe Double-ratchet binding system﻿ Heel lifters for increased traction Full-floating pivot system Carry bag included

name: QTECLOR Leg Gaiters Waterproof Snow Boot Gaiters for Snowshoeing, Hiking, Hunting, Running, Motorcycle Anti-Tear Oxford Fabric, TPU Instep Belt Metal Shoelace Hook for Outdoor
short_description: [500D Nylon 3 Layer Waterproof ]– The outer layer of hiking gaiters is durable tear proof 500D nylon, keep your leg from snake or bug byte. The middle waterproof membrane layer protect your leg and boots from snow and water. The inner breathable liner helps your leg dry even with strenuous exercise

[Great Scratch Resistant Snow Leg Gaiters] – QTECLOR snow gaiters work great in knee deep powder snow conditions with snow boots while snowshoeing! They kept all the snow and moisture out of our boots. They also kept out legs warmer. Also work for running, hiking, hunting, weed eating, motorcycle and all other outdoor activities

[Adjustable Strap and Easy Carrying] – Boot gaiters is super lightweight when wearing. It is very easy to fold and put into your backpack. Compact for travel and go anywhere.The gaiter for snow has a buckle on the top to adjust the tightness, which is more durable than elastic straps, can achieve a customized fit and is comfortable without slipping, and can best prevent moisture from entering

[Easy Installation] – The front velcro of shoe gaiter is faster and more durable than zippers.Easy to stick and warp your leg in great seal. Then fed the top strap through the buckle and keep it comfortable. Put the instep strap though the bottom of your shoe, bound them together. At last, hook your shoelace with the metal hook

[Leg Gaiter for Men & Women] - QTECLOR shoe gaiters is suitable for various styles of shoes. A variety of sizes fit different leg types. If for any reasons you are not satisfied with our gaiters, please contact our customer services.If you want to use our leg gaiters on boots or larger shoes, it is recommended that you buy one size larger.
